description: This file provides security-related utilities for JWT authentication and password hashing, including functions for password hashing/verifications and JWT token creation/decoding. It implements fallbacks when certain dependencies are unavailable and is tailored for use within a FastAPI-based backend.

methods.name: str hash_password(password: str)
methods.description: Hashes a password securely using bcrypt if available, otherwise falls back to salted SHA-256 (not recommended for production).

methods.name: bool verify_password(password: str, hashed: str)
methods.description: Verifies a password against a stored hash, supporting both bcrypt and salted SHA-256 hashes.

methods.name: str create_access_token(subject: str, expires_minutes: Optional[int] = None, claims: Optional[dict[str, Any]] = None)
methods.description: Creates a signed JWT access token with optional expiry and additional claims.

methods.name: dict[str,Any] decode_token(token: str)
methods.description: Decodes and validates a JWT token, returning its claims or raising an error if invalid.

ctags.name: create_access_token
ctags.pattern: /^def create_access_token(subject: str, expires_minutes: Optional[int] = None, claims: Optional[di/
ctags.signature: (subject: str, expires_minutes: Optional[int] = None, claims: Optional[dict[str, Any]] = None)
